website_summaries.verdict: Smaller screen works well if you don't have a lot of space.
pros: Sets up and comes down quickly
Screen stands on its own without ropes
Viewing area is approximately 3 by 5 feet
cons: You must leave the fan running in order for this screen to stay inflated

customer_reviews.title: If item was 100% it would be ok. Be wary.
customer_reviews.text: Screen came with a snag in it and was made like that. It was sewn into the side. As you put the screen up for the first it started to go further across the screen. Probably only get a few uses out of it before the screen is junk. Worst part is it’s not returnable. Be wary
customer_reviews.author: Mary D

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a Halloween party last year!!!! Very impressed with the quality and size. Kids loooved it!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome screen for backyard viewing
customer_reviews.text: I recieved the screen, It was properly in tact and works fine. It is much larger than I expected which I am happy about. It will be great for pool time and a movie and the perfect center piece for the Army v Navy football game watch party. Go Army Beat Navy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Once dark outside-great view quality
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous screen—a little tricky to figure out how to setup but once you do it once, no worries. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonmom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pool side parties
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to show movies to kids at our pool. Compact, fun, durable and easy to inflate and deflate. I also ordered a nylon bag to store this which is protective and compact. You can set your projector to the rear screen setting and the entire set-up fits neatly in a corner.
customer_reviews.author: Beach

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and inflate, nicer than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Tons of fun for the family and parties. I can’t aay enough about how easy and wonderfully is works. I do wish it came with the bag as stated in a special.
customer_reviews.author: cher

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: This was smaller than I expected but still a great product. I have not fully inflated it or used it but I can't wait.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Excellent screen!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for family and friends movie nights by the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: We use it when we go camping and it’s great to keep the kids entertained!
customer_reviews.author: Abby ecroyd

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, Set Up & Store
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up, use and store. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

product_meta.title: Outdoor Projector Screen for Kids – Inflatable Portable Movie Screens for Inside or Outside - 120 inch Diagonal (9ft) to Stand Tall - Front + Rear Projection - Package Inc Frame, Blower, Pegs
product_meta.description: The Holiday Styling Inflatable Movie Screen for indoors or outdoors is the ultimate way to watch Christmas movies for kids this year! The perfect stocking stuffers and a great gift to watch Prime TV or new releases that is easy to set up and pack away. Everything needed to create your own magic cinema inside or outside for sleepovers, parties or playdates - what is not to love? Includes frame, white viewing area, blower, pegs and ropes for a quick and hassle-free set up that even your 7 year old can do. A top Christmas present for kids 6 to 11 years old and something the whole family can enjoy. Spend quality time together to engage and delight - cook up some popcorn and enjoy! Great for gaming, movies, TV or music - this inflatable projector movie screen is the ultimate gift and game that every child and family needs. Our Holiday Styling promise is great service and premium product with 24/7 contact available for any questions ..... buy yours today
feature_bullets: 🎁 THE BEST STOCKING STUFFERS FOR KIDS - to ensure your kids squeal with delight on Christmas morning. What a totally unexpected huge inflatable toy this will be - and now their very own indoor or outdoor TV - what is not to love?
🎄 WATCH CHRISTMAS MOVIES ON YOUR INFLATABLE PROJECTOR SCREEN - which means quality time these holidays with family and friends. Perfect for indoor or outdoor viewing to watch free Prime, TV or music
❄️ GREAT GAMES FOR 9-12 YEAR OLDS - quick, easy and fun - even your 7 year old can set this up. The hardest part is choosing which movie to watch first

🌟 EASY SET UP AND PACK DOWN - and ideal for smaller spaces at 9ft diagonal - everything you need to create a magic movie experience - package includes frame, white viewing area and blower (plus pegs and ropes for outside) all enclosed and ready to go. Just plug in your own projector and speakers for the best movie night at home

🏅THE HOLIDAY STYLING COMMITMENT - to all our customers is care and quality product. If you are not happy just let us know and we will fix the issue immediately. We are here to help. Just add friends, family and a smile. Plus you can add our green storage bag to your cart to complete the set for only $23. Try it today .....
